question: Which country become the 163rd nation to accede to the anti-personnel mine ban convention?
explanation: Sri Lanka became the 163rd nation to accede to the anti-personnel mine ban convention. Sri Lanka's Permanent Mission to the UN Rohan Perera deposited the Instrument of Accession to the Convention of the Prohibition of the use, stockpiling, production and transfer of anti-personnel mines and on their destruction. It prohibits the use, stockpiling, production and transfer of antipersonnel mines. Sri Lanka, in March 2016, had pledged that it will be acceding to the convention to become the 163rd state of the Convention.
